description: This file defines the UsersService class, which provides placeholder asynchronous methods for user management operations such as listing, getting, creating, updating, and deleting users within the application. It serves as a stub for future backend implementation backed by a database or repository layer.

classes.name: UsersService
classes.description: Service stub for Users domain, providing asynchronous placeholder methods for user data operations.

methods.name: list_users
methods.description: Placeholder method that returns a UserListResponse object with a sample user list.

methods.name: get_user
methods.description: Placeholder method that returns a UserRead object for a specified user_id.

methods.name: create_user
methods.description: Placeholder method that creates a new user record based on the provided UserCreate payload.

methods.name: update_user
methods.description: Placeholder method that updates an existing user identified by user_id using the UserUpdate payload.

methods.name: delete_user
methods.description: Placeholder method that returns a confirmation payload indicating deletion of the specified user.
